```
import presentor from 'presentor'

var model = {

  width: '100%',
  height: '100%',

  origin: [10, 10],
  scale: [1.1, 1.1],
  rotation: 0.1,

  components: [{
    type: 'rect',

    left: 100,
    top: 100,
    width: 200,
    height: 200
  }]
};

var target = 'presenter';

var p1 = presentor.create({ target, model });
```
